F

findImpact(Ball) - Method in class Brick_Destroy.Brick
Return value according to the direction of the impact and return 0 if the brick is broken
findImpacts() - Method in class Brick_Destroy.ImpactManager
If the ball impact with the paddle, reverse the ball's Y value
If the ball impact with the brick, increase the score by 10 and decrement brick count by 1
If the ball impact with the side border, reverse the ball's X value
If the ball impact with the upper side border, reverse the ball's Y value
If the ball go beyond the downside border, decrement ball count by 1, decrement score by 10, and set ball's islost to true

N

nextLevel() - Method in class Brick_Destroy.LevelManager
Up level by one, set the brick count to its initial value, and reset the width of the paddle as well
If it is level 5 or level 6, make block1 and block2 visible and set the ball's XSpeed and YSpeed to 4
